00042 #ifndef _FREEBUS_DEBUG_H
00043 #define _FREEBUS_DEBUG_H
00044 
00045 #include <avr/pgmspace.h>
00046 
00047 #ifdef DEBUG_LCD
00048 #include "lcd-lib.h"
00050 #define DEBUG_INIT(x) lcd_init(LCD_CLEAR)
00051 
00052 #define DEBUG_PUTC(x) lcd_putc(x)
00053 
00054 #define DEBUG_PUTC_BLOCKING(x)
00055 
00056 #define DEBUG_PUTS(x) lcd_puts(x)
00057 
00058 #define DEBUG_PUTS_BLOCKING(x)
00059 
00060 #define DEBUG_DIGIT(x) lcd_digit(x)
00061 
00062 #define DEBUG_PUTHEX(x) lcd_hex(x)
00063 
00064 #define DEBUG_PUTHEX_BLOCKING(x)
00065 
00066 #define DEBUG_NEWLINE(x) lcd_putc(' ')
00067 
00068 #define DEBUG_NEWLINE_BLOCKING()
00069 
00070 #define DEBUG_SPACE() 
00071 
00072 #define DEBUG_SPACE_BLOCKING()
00073 
00074 #define DEBUG_PIN1_ON(x) PORTD |= (1<<5)
00075 
00076 #define DEBUG_PIN1_OFF(x) PORTD &= ~(1<<5)
00077 
00078 #define DEBUG_PIN2_ON(x) PORTD |= (1<<6)
00079 
00080 #define DEBUG_PIN2_OFF(x) PORTD &= ~(1<<6)
00081 
00082 #elif defined DEBUG_UART
00083 #include "uart.h"
00085 #define DEBUG_INIT(x) uart_init()
00086

00088

00090

00094 
00095 #define DEBUG_PUTHEX(x) uart_hex(x)
00096

00098 
00099 #define DEBUG_NEWLINE() uart_newline()
00100 
00101 #define DEBUG_NEWLINE_BLOCKING() uart_newline_blocking()
00102 
00103 #define DEBUG_SPACE() uart_putc(' ')
00104 
00105 #define DEBUG_SPACE_BLOCKING() uart_putc_blocking(' ')
00106
